snippet: The British retro-soul singer's album "21" finished the year with 14 appearances at No. 1 on the Billboard charts.
abstract: The British retro-soul singer's album "21" finished the year with 14 appearances at No. 1 on the Billboard charts.

headline.main: Adele Finishes 2011 at Top of Charts
headline.print_headline: No Doubt About It: It Was Adele’s Year
